```{r include=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
runs <- read_csv("runs.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(runs)
```
```{r}
runs$horse_id <- factor(runs$horse_id)
unique(runs$horse_id)
```
```{r}
runs$jockey_id <- factor(runs$jockey_id)
unique(runs$jockey_id)
```
```{r}
runs$trainer_id <- factor(runs$trainer_id)
unique(runs$trainer_id)
```
```{r}
runs %>% 
  group_by(horse_id) %>% 
  summarise(wins=sum(won)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(wins))
```
```{r}
runs$race_id <- factor(runs$race_id)
unique(runs$race_id)
```
